title: Daily reminder: There is still no compensation for AFKs even during your series
body: No i am unworthy perhaps for gold 2 because my {{champion:68}} decides to afk rage quit. I worked hard to get here riot i find it such a slap in the face that i receive NO compensation, technically its your fault because **YOUR matchmaking system **give me {{champion:68}}  i never asked for him on my team? idc if you cant reverse the drop on my MMR or loss forgiven there are OTHER ways to compensate that , paid to win games often compensate by rewarding the players when the issue is on them and if this {{champion:68}} isnt punished i get nothing out of this just aggravation and a waste of my effort in a series match for gold 2. Afks are one of the most frustrating aspects of this game and yet there is **NEVER any compensation**.

replies.body: It is not Riot's fault when someone AFKs. They do not purposefully place an AFK on your team, nor can they read the minds of human beings on the other side of a computer screen. To blame them so ignorantly for the faults of another completely independent, self aware human being would be just as stupid as you blaming the mayor of your town because noisy neighbors moved in next door. Grow up kid and deal with life. Don't blame others for 100% human problems that absolutely no one but the person doing the behavior can predict or control.
I think the amount of harass it would create is honestly just not worth it.

>  idc if you cant reverse the drop on my MMR or loss forgiven there are OTHER ways to compensate that

Im not saying at all to make the match loss forgiven im saying Riot could potentially give us a chest maybe? an icon for free? just SOMETHING to compensate the AFK experience in ranked queue.

2 man Q.
1 dodges,,,,
#how2farm
Make it so the while premade is punished

Really?

Soooooo

Every time there is a premade that DOESN'T do it on purpose... Punish the second person???

The second person is just as screwed over as you are. But instead of just taking the LP loss they now take EXTRA lp loss. Over double of what it usually is?

Please.

If you get hit by a baseball in the eye, sure it sucks, you did nothing to deserve it, but what are you going to do? Beat up the person who did it? Even if it as on accident? Oh crap they had a friend, are you gonna beat both of them up now?

Get used 2 it.

Shit happens.

"Dry Your Tears"

And SUCK IT UP.

FirstWorldProblems...

Ok then tell me a way to make it work instead of complaing.

 There is no way to make everyone happy. If you make it so only the one to afk gets punished then people will abuse it, if you make it so the whole premade takes it then if anyone has to go the whole premade gets punished for nothing, if you keep it the same then everyone on the team is punished for an afk.

You can't have your cake and eat it too

I'm saying it won't work.

There's nothing you can do but punish whomever afked. Even if real life does come up. (Being that leaver buster is only if you have like 2-3 left games in quick succession it honestly isn't a problem if someone does leave due to real life)

All the argument you have is, I DON'T WANT TO BE PUNISHED LETS FIND SCRAPEGOAT!

When that doesn't work due to the inherit flaws.

FUCK THE SECOND PERSON NO MATTER AS LONG AS I DONT GET PUNISHED

The system is fine as it is.

If someone afks sucks for you.

Deal with it.

Ever gone to work and someone you needed the help of was sick?

Oh shit, what are you going to do?

Fire the bitch?

No.

There's sick days.

Same as how this game works. If you leave 2 much, you get "fired" or punished. If you leave occasionally your just using sick days for things that come up. What your asking is that you should get a bonus because that person was missing for lord knows what.

FUCKING
SUCK
IT
UP.

Scapegoat
a person who is blamed for the wrongdoings, mistakes, or faults of others, especially for reasons of expediency.

A scapegoat for what? 

If someone is home sick from work do all the employees get punished?

No.

Why should four people get punished for what one person did?

Right now trolls can also abuse the system. I've had people give first blood before the minions even came (they didn't fight back)
Then afk so we couldn't remake.

The system is not fine.

Lol.

So what if it isn't fine.
The proposed system is worse. That is all I'm saying.

Afks fall into two categories
Trolls-Honestly though most would rather keep feeding so not really
Actually AFKS-Due to IRL
Give up-They gave up a lost game

While I do think that someone who actually gave up should be punished, it's being more of a scrapgoat situation.

I have SEEN people bully people out of games. Rewarding people for doing so is not reasonable, if anything your encouraging this sort of behavior.

IF the enemy team is 40 kills ahead and at your base and it's only like 15 mins in, someone might afk after failing a surrender vote. Why should the other 4 be excluded from the game that they lost for the team?

And yes if someone is sick everyone else does in theory get punished.

If you and 2 other people need to finish a presentation/concept analysis (Just something of the sort)
And one is sick, and that one who is sick is the only one who has access to the resources that you need. Oh shit you just lost a day that you needed to be working!


I get that it's annoying to get afks.
I'm just saying that any solution will be abusive and abused.
The system is unperfected as it is, but it's damn well the best your going to get.

honestly i still cant  this hasn't been addressed... riot CLEARLY knows when you have an afk... it mean their name is GREYED OUT in post game and the only option you have is "report", if you afk a big freaking message pop up on your screen saying "hey your afk"

but there is ZERO reason to make a solo/duo ranked player lose lp when your system CLEARLY knows you had an AFK.

how hard would it be to make the AFK  (and his duo) lose ALL the LP from the team or at LEAST _some_ of it?  there is no point in taking LP from players who clearly had next to zero change of winning....

i mean riots system is designed to make a EVEN 5v5 match. IF that systems is actually working properly ... then it SHOULD be next to impossible to win a 4v5.

i mean there are NO downsides to this.

you not going to FORCE anyone to "AFK" to by raging at them because they would lose MUCH more LP and they would never agree to it and u would just get yourself banned.

your never going to "swap afks" in a duo becuase if either you or your partner afk.. you BOTH still lose lp.. just the other 3 player who weren't with you don't.

its a stupid simple solution and its stupid why this hasn't been implemented

There would still be abuse cases. If a friend plays with you on an alt and things went south, they could just disconnect and tank the L. A possible way for this to work were for it to not work within duo's, or to make Ranked a true Solo Que environment. 

Ps: if I'm not wrong, dc's do take some percentage of the LP you lose
